Title: Zero Out Xerosh
Description:
$p, the nerubians all seem to be taking orders from that siegelord south of here. If we can defeat her, that may turn the tide of this attack.

Without a leader organizing the attack, the Arathi may be able to drive back the nerubians, especially if Faerin is able to light this dawntower she spoke of.

But the longer we delay, the greater damage to the Arathi airships. Go quickly!
PortraitGiverText: Xerosh has been responsible for countless Arathi deaths over years.
CompletionText: Were you able to defeat the siegelord?
RewardText:
With the nerubian leader defeated, we should be able to leave the defenses to the Arathi.

You've saved many lives today, $n.
